error.title: Error!
error.429_e: Please try again in another time.
error.500_e: An internal error accoured in the server. Sorry for the inconvenience.

kkutu.title: Rule the words! KKuTu Online
kkutu.meta_desc: 온라인 끝말잇기, 앞말잇기, 자음퀴즈, 십자말풀이, 타자 대결까지! 끄투에서 어휘력의 제왕이 되어 보세요.
kkutu.websocketUnsupport:
This game only supports Internet Explorer(10), Chrome(16), Firefox(11), Opera(12.1), Safari(6) or higher.
Please update your browser.
kkutu.dictionarySupport: Dictionary Support:WordNet
kkutu.welcomeTestServer: 테스트 서버에 접속했습니다. 본 서버는 특별한 공지 없이 폭발하거나 닫힐 수 있습니다.
kkutu.error_401:
손님 계정은 게임 관전만 가능합니다.
우측 상단의 로그인 단추를 눌러 로그인해 보세요!
kkutu.error_402:
손님 계정은 감자 서버에만 접속이 가능합니다.
우측 상단의 로그인 단추를 눌러 로그인해 보세요!
kkutu.error_404: Cannot find room to join. Create one?
kkutu.error_406: You cannot rejoin the room you have been kicked!
kkutu.error_408: Connection Closed: Another computer join with your account.
kkutu.error_409: Connection Closed: This account is already playing!
kkutu.error_410: You are excluded in the game by one of the administrator.
kkutu.error_411:
You cannot start game alone.
If you want to play alone, please click on [Practice] or click on [Invite AI] in [Invite].
kkutu.error_412: All players must have been readied.
kkutu.error_413: Please select at least one of the themes.
kkutu.error_414: Invalid theme set. Please try again.
kkutu.error_415: AI can't join in this game type.
kkutu.error_416:
This room is already playing.
Will you see the game playing?
kkutu.error_417: This account is not in lobby.
kkutu.error_419: This player already got a invitation message.
kkutu.error_421: Please login to use this feature.
kkutu.error_423: Please login to use this feature.
kkutu.error_424: This player either doesn't exist or is now offline. If there is(are) space(s) in the nickname, erase them and try again. User:
kkutu.error_425: There is no player to respond.
kkutu.error_426: You can't sell items you are equipping.
kkutu.error_428: Observer is automatically kicked after game has ended.
kkutu.error_430: The thing you have requested does not exist.
kkutu.error_432: Room configuration has some error(s). Please set the amount of players correctly.
kkutu.error_433: Room configuration has some error(s). Please set the amount of rounds correctly.
kkutu.error_435: You an only combine Word Pieces up to 6 at once.
kkutu.error_436: You can only combine Word Pieces making up a word in the dictionary.
kkutu.error_437: You were kicked by failing 3 times in a row.
kkutu.error_438: You can't use this while playing.
kkutu.error_440: 손님, 본인 확인이 되지 않은 회원 및 만 16세 미만의 청소년은 오전 0시부터 오전 6시까지 게임 이용이 제한됩니다.
kkutu.error_441: 회원님의 생년월일 정보를 읽을 수 없습니다. 로그인된 계정의 생년월일 정보가 공개되어 있는지 확인하신 뒤 끄투에서 다시 로그인해 보세요. 본인 확인이 끝나면 생년월일 정보를 숨겨도 됩니다.
kkutu.error_442: Connection Closed: There were no response for 5 minuites.
kkutu.error_444: You are banned from our server! Reason:
kkutu.error_445: 본인 확인에 성공했습니다. 끄투를 이용해 주셔서 감사합니다.
kkutu.error_450: This player doesn't exist or is offline or it's not in the same server.
kkutu.error_451: Please login to use this feature.
kkutu.error_453: You can't add guest player(s) as a friend!
kkutu.error_454: Sent a Invitation message. Waiting Respond.
kkutu.error_455: You can only delete friends which are offline!
kkutu.error_500: 서버 점검 혹은 업데이트가 진행 중입니다.
kkutu.error_4030: Your level is higher than the limit of this room.
kkutu.error_4031: Your level is higher than the limit of this room.
kkutu.checkAgeAsk:
끄투에서는 본인 확인을 위해 생년월일을 입력받고 있습니다. 입력된 생년월일은 본인 확인 및 내부 정보 처리에만 이용되며 제3자에게 공개되지 않습니다.
본인 확인을 진행합니까?
kkutu.checkAgeNo: 입력 값이 올바르지 않습니다. 다시 확인해 주세요.
kkutu.checkAgeInput2: 생년월일 중 월을 입력해 주세요. (1~12 중)
kkutu.checkAgeInput3: 생년월일 중 일을 입력해 주세요. (1~31 중)
kkutu.checkAgeSure: 아래 입력한 생년월일이 맞습니까? 입력된 생년월일은 본인 확인 및 내부 정보 처리에만 이용되며 제3자에게 공개되지 않습니다.
kkutu.linkWarning: Are you sure to redirect to this link?
kkutu.trollWarning: If you fail to pass your turn 1 more time, you will automatically be kicked.
kkutu.modex0:
English Word Chain which begins with two thirds at the end. Ex:
apple → please → secret
kkutu.modex1:
English Word Chain which begins with one letter at the end. Ex:
apple → elephant → time
kkutu.modex2:
Korean Word Chain which begins with one letter at the end. However, must use words that are 3 letters. Ex:
강아지 → 지렁이 → 이발소
kkutu.modex3:
Korean Word Chain which begins with one letter at the end. Ex:
그물 → 물레방아 → 아저씨
kkutu.modex4: Guess a Korean word with having only some hint(s).
kkutu.modex5: Find the right answer that fits in the crossword puzzle.
kkutu.modex6: Enter a given Korean word as quickly as possible.
kkutu.modex7: Enter a given English word as quickly as possible.
kkutu.modex8:
Korean Word Chain which begins with one letter at the beginning. Ex:
고구마 → 이실직고 → 맏이
kkutu.modex9: Guess a Korean word with having only some hint(s).
kkutu.modex10: Enter a Korean word which fits in a given theme.
kkutu.modex11: Enter a English word which fits in a given theme.
kkutu.modex12: Make a Korean word from ramdomly mixed letters.
kkutu.modex13: Make a English word from ramdomly mixed letters.
kkutu.subJamsu: All players are readied. Please start the game in 30 seconds or you are kicked.
kkutu.masterJamsu: You are kicked because you didn't started the game in 30 seconds.
kkutu.hasKicked: You are kicked from the room!
kkutu.inputChat: Enter in the bottom chatting box.
kkutu.explManner: Can only use words that will go on.
kkutu.explInjeong: Allows you to use specific words.
kkutu.explMission: If you type a word including a letter given, you'll get more points.
kkutu.explProverb: A sentence will be shown, not just words.
kkutu.explSami: Will use both 3 letter words, 2 letter words.
kkutu.explbeginner: Accepts only players with level lower than 50.
kkutu.explmedium: 레벨 100 이하, 레벨 50 이상만 입장이 가능합니다.
kkutu.explhigh: 레벨 200 이하, 레벨 100 이상만 입장이 가능합니다.
kkutu.explveryhigh: 레벨 300 이하, 레벨 200 이상만 입장이 가능합니다.
kkutu.explInjPick: Select Theme(s) to use in the game.
kkutu.kickVoteNotice: If you don't participate in the time limit, system will automatically mark it as Agree.
kkutu.kickVoteText: 's kick vote has been started. Do you agree?
kkutu.invited: (Room Number) Room sent an invitation. Enter?
kkutu.guestExit: Please login to have more fun!
kkutu.sureConsume: Are you sure to use this?
kkutu.sureEquip: Are you sure you want to equip:
kkutu.sureUnequip: Are you sure you want to unequip:
kkutu.dressWhichHand: Which hand will you dress? ( OK: Left / Cancel: Right )
kkutu.cfTray: Make a word using word pieces!
kkutu.cfBlend: You can combine 3 letters which has no meaning. It will make a new letter.
kkutu.cfSureCompose: Are you sure? Word letters used will be destroyed!
kkutu.hasExpired: item has expired, and is now destroyed.
kkutu.cmd_f: (/f) Show a chat log with 100 messages recieved/sended recently.
kkutu.cmd_ee: (/ee Message) Send a private message(DM) to a person you whispered most recently.
kkutu.cmd_wb: (/wb To...) Blacklist selected player's DM. Send again to cancel.
kkutu.cmd_shut: (/shut To...) Blacklist selected player's message. Send again to cancel.
kkutu.cmd_id: (/id To...) Find the ID of a player you selected.
kkutu.sureInvite: Are you sure to invite this player?
kkutu.onlyUnlock: See only rooms with no password
kkutu.attemptFriendAdd: attempted you to be a friend. Accept?
kkutu.friendEditMemo: Edit a memo of this frined. (Maximum 50 Characters)
kkutu.friendAddNotice:
Input the ID of the player you want to be friends with. 
You can get ID by typing /id <player>
kkutu.friendSureRemove: Are you sure to remove this friend?
kkutu.quickStatus: Amount of Room(s) with selected configuration:
kkutu.dying: Error has occured on this channel. This channel will be closed in 10 seconds. Sorry for the inconvenience.
kkutu.blocked: Spam Detected! For a short time, you will not be able to send messages.
kkutu.paybackHelp: Select items to sell clicking the item while pressing Ctrl.
kkutu.surePayback: Are you sure to sell this item in:
kkutu.moremiAfter: Moremi after you equip this item
kkutu.alreadyGot: You already own this item.
kkutu.surePurchase: Are you sure to buy this item?
kkutu.purchased: Purchased! Check it in your inventory.
kkutu.okgExpl:
You can earn more XP
by playing 10 mins or more, which is !
Every 10 mins, it will be more powerful.
kkutu.okgNotice: You earned Gameplay Buff by playing 10 mins or more!
kkutu.okgExpired: Day had passed, and your Gameplay Buff is expired.
kkutu.replayError: This file is not KKuTu replay file.
kkutu.wpDesc1: Enter a word you want to add.
kkutu.wpDesc2: After word is added, you will get small amount of XP!
kkutu.wpFail_401: Error! The word is not a noun!
kkutu.wpFail_402: Error! Please Login to request a word.
kkutu.wpFail_403: Error! This word is already requested.
kkutu.wpFail_404: Error! This word is not valid.
kkutu.wpFail_405: Error! This word is not in the wiki.
kkutu.wpFail_406: Error! This word doesn't obey the request standard!

game/fates.title: 카드 뽑기
game/fates.fcRule1: 제한된 시간 안에 W키를 눌러 목표 카드와 색을 맞추세요! 기회는 단 한 번입니다!
